reviewText: Very early work of Valerie Bertinelli showing off her fantastic talent, This is a story that is still happening every day. Joe
When I first saw this movie it was different and well done.  Valerie Bertinelli was very good in it.

I thought this movie was pretty good considering it was a made for TV movie. I am a big Valerie Bertinelli fan so, I enjoyed viewing this film and giving a positive review on it. Her acting skills were excellent and it was her first TV movie while still appearing on One Day At A Time.

I highly recommend this film to any Valerie Bertinelli fan. You won't be disappointed.

One of the better made for TV movies, but the DVD copy I got is of a poor quality (although watchable)!If your a Val Fan its worth the low end price! Otherwise if you want a better than VHS quality recording then pass on this one and wait for the 2nd generation print!
I enjoyed the movie. Valerie Bertinelli is an excellent actor. I highly recommend this seller. Very fast shipping.

I have been searching for this movie for a long time, the last few years.  I am so glad it is offered and I got through Amazon.  It is a wonderfully acted story about the effect of war and loss, one of Valerie Bertinelli's finest roles.
The movie is good, but the quality of the DVD is poor.
it was good-played well was in good condition.
I love old movies that some stars used to play in. It is a good movie and nice cast of characters.
This story is so true to life. This happen to many young men and women. What a beautiful story.  Her feelings are so real.  You never want to forget that love.
